bibl.title: Report: Hatching Sheet, Coosa River, by the State Board of Health of Alabama, 1915

div1.p: This report details reproduction of mosquitoes along the Coosa River.

div1.head: Report: Hatching Sheet, Coosa River, by the State Board of Health of Alabama, 1915
